title: Nixon Men's A9511418 C45 SS Analog Display Swiss Quartz Grey Watch
features: A new take on old-school style with small, but significant details in a 45mm field-inspired design
3 hand Swiss movement with large date window at 9 o'clock with a magnifier raised from the crystal
Water resistant to 100m (330ft): in general, suitable for swimming and snorkeling, but not diving
description: Classic style on a modern scale.
